New Records: DR Congo secured a 3-1 victory over Guinea, marking their qualification to the AFCON semi-finals.
Key Match Events: Yoane Wissa scored a decisive penalty in the 65th minute to give DR Congo a 2-1 lead.
Arthur Masuaku scored a late goal in the 82nd minute to extend DR Congo's lead to 3-1.
DR Congo captain Chancel Mbemba equalized in the first half after Guinea's Mohamed Bayo converted a penalty.
Post-Match Reflections: DR Congo's qualification to the semi-finals was a significant achievement in their AFCON campaign.
